languages.text: "Она без устали охотится на пиратов и смутьянов, приводит к покаянию восставшие колонии и наводит на них строгие порядки. Тяжесть ее гнева велика — орбитальные кольца из трупов еретиков, что опоясывают наказанные ею колонии, служат знаком для тех, кто уцелел. Как ее личный духовник и исповедник, я не устаю радоваться ее успехам в вере".

traits.locale_text: "Она без устали охотится на пиратов и смутьянов, приводит к покаянию восставшие колонии и наводит на них строгие порядки. Тяжесть ее гнева велика — орбитальные кольца из трупов еретиков, что опоясывают наказанные ею колонии, служат знаком для тех, кто уцелел. Как ее личный духовник и исповедник, я не устаю радоваться ее успехам в вере".

languages.text: "She relentlessly hunts down pirates and firebrands, and brings rebelling colonies to repentance, establishing strict discipline. The weight of her wrath is great indeed — the colonies she punishes are girded with orbital rings of heretic corpses as a warning to the survivors. As her personal confessor and guide, I find no end to the joy her triumphs in faith bring me."
languages.original_text: "Она без устали охотится на пиратов и смутьянов, приводит к покаянию восставшие колонии и наводит на них строгие порядки. Тяжесть ее гнева велика — орбитальные кольца из трупов еретиков, что опоясывают наказанные ею колонии, служат знаком для тех, кто уцелел. Как ее личный духовник и исповедник, я не устаю радоваться ее успехам в вере".

traits.locale_text: "Relentlessly she hunts down pirates and firebrands, brings rebelling colonies to repentance, and establishes strict discipline there. The weight of her wrath is great — orbital rings of heretic corpses placed around the colonies that she had punished serve as a warning to the survivors. As her personal confessor and guide, I find no end to the joy her progress in faith brings me."

"Relentlessly she hunts down pirates and firebrands, brings rebelling colonies to repentance, and establishes strict discipline there. The weight of her wrath is great — orbital rings of heretic corpses placed around the colonies that she had punished serve as a warning to the survivors. As her personal confessor and guide, I find no end to the joy her progress in faith brings me."

"She relentlessly hunts down pirates and firebrands, and brings rebelling colonies to repentance, establishing strict discipline. The weight of her wrath is great indeed — the colonies she punishes are girded with orbital rings of heretic corpses as a warning to the survivors. As her personal confessor and guide, I find no end to the joy her triumphs in faith bring me."

"She relentlessly hunts down pirates and firebrands, and brings rebelling colonies to repentance, establishing strict discipline. The weight of her wrath is great indeed — the colonies she punishes are girded with orbital rings of heretic corpses as a warning to the survivors. As her personal confessor and guide, I find no end to the joy her triumphs in faith bring me."

"She relentlessly hunts down pirates and firebrands, and brings rebelling colonies to repentance, establishing strict discipline. The weight of her wrath is great indeed — the colonies she punishes are girded with orbital rings of heretic corpses as a warning to the survivors. As her personal confessor and guide, I find no end to the joy her triumphs in faith bring me."

languages.text: “她无情地追捕海盗和异端分子，让叛乱的殖民地忏悔，建立起了严格的秩序。她的愤怒确实充满了力量。那些遭到她惩罚的殖民地，被丢到太空中的异端分子的尸体甚至组成了星环，用来警告那些幸存之人。身为她的私人告解者与导师，她在信仰方面的胜利为我带来了无尽的喜悦。”
languages.original_text: "She relentlessly hunts down pirates and firebrands, and brings rebelling colonies to repentance, establishing strict discipline. The weight of her wrath is great indeed — the colonies she punishes are girded with orbital rings of heretic corpses as a warning to the survivors. As her personal confessor and guide, I find no end to the joy her triumphs in faith bring me."

traits.locale_text: “她无情地追捕海盗和异端分子，让叛乱的殖民地忏悔，建立起了严格的秩序。她的愤怒确实充满了力量。那些遭到她惩罚的殖民地，被丢到太空中的异教徒的尸体甚至组成了星环，用来警告那些幸存之人。身为她的私人司祭与导师，她在信仰方面的胜利为我带来了无尽的喜悦。”

languages.text: «Busca piratas e instigadores y lleva a las colonias rebeldes al arrepentimiento a fin de crear una disciplina estricta. El peso de su ira es grande, y las colonias que castiga están rodeadas de anillos orbitales de cadáveres de herejes, que sirven de advertencia a los supervivientes. Como su confesor y guía, son muchas las alegrías que me provocan sus triunfos en nombre de la fe».
languages.original_text: "She relentlessly hunts down pirates and firebrands, and brings rebelling colonies to repentance, establishing strict discipline. The weight of her wrath is great indeed — the colonies she punishes are girded with orbital rings of heretic corpses as a warning to the survivors. As her personal confessor and guide, I find no end to the joy her triumphs in faith bring me."

traits.locale_text: «Busca piratas e instigadores y lleva a las colonias rebeldes al arrepentimiento a fin de crear una disciplina estricta. El peso de su ira es grande, y las colonias que castiga están rodeadas de anillos orbitales de cadáveres de herejes, que sirven de advertencia a los supervivientes. Como su confesor y guía, son muchas las alegrías que me provocan sus triunfos en nombre de la fe».

languages.text: 「彼女は海賊や扇動者を執拗に追い詰め、反逆したコロニーを悔い改めさせ、厳しい規律を確立させます。その怒りはそれはそれは熾烈で…彼女が罰したコロニーは、生き残った者への警告として異端者の死体でできた軌道輪で覆われるのです。彼女の個人的な懺悔師であり指導者として、彼女の信仰の勝利は私に無限の喜びを与えてくれます」
languages.original_text: "She relentlessly hunts down pirates and firebrands, and brings rebelling colonies to repentance, establishing strict discipline. The weight of her wrath is great indeed — the colonies she punishes are girded with orbital rings of heretic corpses as a warning to the survivors. As her personal confessor and guide, I find no end to the joy her triumphs in faith bring me."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女は海賊や扇動者を執拗に追い詰め、反逆したコロニーを悔い改めさせ、厳しい規律を確立させます。その怒りはそれはそれは熾烈で…彼女が罰したコロニーは、生き残った者への警告として異端者の死体でできた軌道輪で覆われるのです。彼女の個人的な懺悔師であり指導者として、彼女の信仰の勝利は私に無限の喜びを与えてくれます」

languages.text: "Sie jagt gnadenlos Piraten und Hitzköpfe, bringt aufrührerische Kolonien zur Buße und sorgt für strenge Disziplin. Ihr Zorn hat in der Tat großes Gewicht – die Kolonien, die sie bestraft, erhalten Orbitalringe aus Ketzerleichen, als Warnung für die Überlebenden. Als ihr persönlicher Beichtvater und Begleiter ist meine Freude über ihre Triumphe des Glaubens endlos."
languages.original_text: "She relentlessly hunts down pirates and firebrands, and brings rebelling colonies to repentance, establishing strict discipline. The weight of her wrath is great indeed — the colonies she punishes are girded with orbital rings of heretic corpses as a warning to the survivors. As her personal confessor and guide, I find no end to the joy her triumphs in faith bring me."

traits.locale_text: "Sie jagt gnadenlos Piraten und Hitzköpfe, bringt aufrührerische Kolonien zur Buße und sorgt für strenge Disziplin. Ihr Zorn hat in der Tat großes Gewicht – die Kolonien, die sie bestraft, erhalten Orbitalringe aus Ketzerleichen, als Warnung für die Überlebenden. Als ihr persönlicher Beichtvater und Begleiter ist meine Freude über ihre Triumphe des Glaubens endlos."

languages.text: « Elle traque les pirates et les agitateurs sans répit, et force les colonies rebelles à se repentir, mettant ainsi en place une discipline stricte. Le poids de son courroux est immense. Les colonies qu'elle punit se retrouvent dotées d'anneaux orbitaux composés de cadavres d'hérétiques, en guise d'avertissement pour les survivants. Étant à la fois son confesseur attitré et son guide, ses triomphes en matière de foi me procurent une joie infinie. »
languages.original_text: "She relentlessly hunts down pirates and firebrands, and brings rebelling colonies to repentance, establishing strict discipline. The weight of her wrath is great indeed — the colonies she punishes are girded with orbital rings of heretic corpses as a warning to the survivors. As her personal confessor and guide, I find no end to the joy her triumphs in faith bring me."

traits.locale_text: « Elle traque les pirates et les agitateurs sans répit, et force les colonies rebelles à se repentir, mettant ainsi en place une discipline stricte. Le poids de son courroux est immense. Les colonies qu'elle punit se retrouvent dotées d'anneaux orbitaux composés de cadavres d'hérétiques, en guise d'avertissement pour les survivants. Étant à la fois son confesseur attitré et son guide, ses triomphes en matière de foi me procurent une joie infinie. »

languages.text: "Durup dinlenmeden korsanları ve kışkırtıcıları avlar, başkaldıran kolonilere tövbe ettirip katı bir disiplin kurar. Hiddeti tam manasıyla sınır tanımaz. Cezalandırdığı kolonilerin yörüngelerine, sağ kalanlara ibret olsun diye kâfir cesetlerinden oluşan kuşaklar bırakır. Kendisinin şahsi günah çıkaranı ve rehberi olarak dinî başarıları, bana tarif edilemez bir mutluluk veriyor."
languages.original_text: "She relentlessly hunts down pirates and firebrands, and brings rebelling colonies to repentance, establishing strict discipline. The weight of her wrath is great indeed — the colonies she punishes are girded with orbital rings of heretic corpses as a warning to the survivors. As her personal confessor and guide, I find no end to the joy her triumphs in faith bring me."

traits.locale_text: "Durup dinlenmeden korsanları ve kışkırtıcıları avlıyor ve başkaldıran kolonilere tövbe ettirip katı bir disiplin kuruyor. Hiddeti gerçekten de çok kudretli. Cezalandırdığı kolonilerin yörüngelerine, hayatta kalanlara uyarı olsun diye kâfir cesetlerinden oluşan kuşaklar bırakır. Onun kişisel günah çıkaranı ve rehberi olarak, dinî başarıları bana tarif edilemez bir mutluluk veriyor."
